amendment.description: To improve the transition between Presidential administrations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3806 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3806 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S10007-10009; text: CR S10007-10008) To improve the transition between Presidential administrations.
